author: ehu
msg: Make svn_stream_from_aprfile2 the only supported interface.
(svn_stream_from_aprfile2): Change function signature to explicitly allow
The implementation part of this change was already committed in r17935.

author: ehu
msg: Fix NULL APR file aprfile stream close crash.
svn_stream_from_aprfile returns an empty stream when its FILE argument
is NULL.  In that case the close handler shouldn't be installed.

author: djames
msg: * build/generator/gen_win.py: Add missing import. Followup to r17933.

author: djames
msg: Checkout SWIG libraries and build external runtimes one at a time, so as
to be more friendly to parallel make. Move functionality for checking out
(swig-checkout-files): New configuration value. Defines which SWIG headers
should be checked out from the SWIG library.
(Generator.write): Checkout SWIG headers using new checkout_swig_header
(Generator.write): Rewrite function. Build external runtime for each
(Generator.write_external_runtime): Remove code for checking out SWIG
the SWIG library into Subversion's proxy directory.

author: kfogel
msg: I didn't leave a forwarding pointer; this section was new enough that
probably no one was linking to it yet.
